mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KINDER_CLASS S WHERE (S.KINDER_NO,S.CLASS_NAME,S.OPENED_DATE) IN (SELECT KINDER_NO,CLASS_NAME,OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K WHERE K.TEACHER_NO = #{userNo2})
SELECT CLASS_NAME FROM KINDER_CLASS K WHERE K.TEACHER_NO = #{userNo2} AND SUBSTR(OPENED_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)

SELECT C.CHILDREN_NAME,C.CHILDREN_NO,A.CHANGE_NAME FROM CHILDREN C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON U.USER_NO = A.USER_NO WHERE C.CHILDREN_NO IN (SELECT C.CHILDREN_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS C WHERE (KINDER_NO,CLASS_NAME,OPENED_DATE) IN ( SELECT K.KINDER_NO,K.CLASS_NAME,K.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K JOIN USERS U ON K.TEACHER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE K.TEACHER_NO = #{userNo2}) AND C.DIVISION = '원생')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = B.WRITER WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '알림장' AND U.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SUBSTR(BOARD_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_AN A WHERE A.BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.WRITER = U.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SUBSTR(BOARD_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN KINDER_CLASS K ON(K.TEACHER_NO = B.WRITER) WHERE B.STATUS='N' AND B.KINDER_NO = #{kinderNum} AND K.TEACHER_NO = #{teacherNum} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = '알림장' AND (B.KINDER_NO = #{kinderNum} AND B.CLASS_NO IS NULL OR B.CLASS_NO = #{classNum})

SELECT B.BOARD_NO,B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CONTENT,B.BOARD_DATE,K.CLASS_NAME,A.CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN KINDER_CLASS K ON(K.TEACHER_NO = B.WRITER) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.USER_NO = B.WRITER) WHERE B.STATUS='N' AND B.KINDER_NO = #{kinderNum} AND K.TEACHER_NO = #{teacherNum} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = '알림장' AND (B.KINDER_NO = #{kinderNum} AND B.CLASS_NO IS NULL OR B.CLASS_NO = #{classNum) ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

(SELECT B.BOARD_NO,B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_DATE,WRITER, K.CLASS_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.WRITER = U.USER_NO JOIN KINDER_CLASS K ON B.WRITER = K.TEACHER_NO WHERE B.WRITER = 5 AND BOARD_TYPE = '알림장' AND B.STATUS='N')

SELECT B.BOARD_NO,B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CONTENT,B.BOARD_DATE,A.ANNOUNCEMENT_NO,A.ANNOUNCEMENT_CONTENT,A.CHILDREN_NO,T.CHANGE_NAME,B.WRITER FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_AN A ON (B.BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT T ON (B.BOARD_NO = T.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNum}

SELECT C.CLASS_NO,C.TEACHER_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS C WHERE (KINDER_NO,CLASS_NAME,OPENED_DATE) IN (SELECT K.KINDER_NO, K.CLASS_NAME,K.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K WHERE K.CHILDREN_NO = #{userNo} AND C.DIVISION = '선생님')
